get.description: Get last 50 posts of a company. 1 credit per call

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: use this param to get posts in next results page: 0 for page 1, 50 for page 2, 100 for page 3, etc.

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: It is required when fetching the next results page. The token from the previous call must be used.

get.description: Get last 50 posts of a profile. 1 credit per call

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: use this param to get posts in next results page: 0 for page 1, 50 for page 2 100 for page 3, etc.

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: It is required when fetching the next results page. The token from the previous call must be used.

parameters.name: postedAt
parameters.description: It is not an official filter. It filters posts after fetching them from LinkedIn and returns posts that are newer than the given date. Example value: 2024-01-01 00:00

Search Jobs

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: please follow this link to find location id

parameters.name: companyIds
parameters.description: please follow this link to find company id

parameters.name: datePosted
parameters.description: it could be one of these; anyTime, pastMonth, pastWeek, past24Hours

parameters.name: salary
parameters.description: it could be one of these; 40k+, 60k+, 80k+, 100k+, 120k+, 140k+, 160k+, 180k+, 200k+ Example: 80k+

parameters.name: jobType
parameters.description: it could be one of these; fullTime, partTime, contract, internship Example: contract

parameters.name: experienceLevel
parameters.description: it could be one of these; internship, associate, director, entryLevel, midSeniorLevel. executive example: executive

parameters.name: titleIds
parameters.description: please follow this link to find title id by title

parameters.name: functionIds
parameters.description: please follow this link to find function id

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: it could be one of these; 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, etc. The maximum number of start is 975

parameters.name: industryIds
parameters.description: please follow this link to find industry id

parameters.name: onsiteRemote
parameters.description: it could be one of these; onSite remote hybrid example: remote

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: it could be one of these; mostRelevant, mostRecent

get.description: Get Profile Data, Given and Received Recommendations. **2 credits per call**
